name: New Eggs Shoot 2018
description:
New Eggs Shoot 2018 - this is best version of bubble shoot game which is very amazing and suitable for all age: child, teenage, adults.Use your ability to observe, with the ability to judge, shoot eggs to arrange at least 3 eggs of the same color. Shoot the dinosaur eggs to explode and you will get points, the more the egg frame explodes, the more eggs fall the more points, this is an easy game but hard to score high, try playing with friends to see who gets high scores. More in the middle of the game log logs offline!
- With beautiful graphics.
- It sounds very good and unloading spirit of solidarity.
-The picture is humorous and harmonious.
- Highly entertaining or to kill time at leisure.
-The face of the pearl has a five-pointed star.
